column4: Hello, I wonder if there are any Open Source-developers here who could be so kind to participate in a interview for a researchpaper?
curious, how are you focusing it on open source developers and not just any developer? how is there a difference?
well there is something called intrinsic and extrinsic motivation, there seems to be a difference between open and closed source :)
do you really think it is that black and white?
no, but this research is focusing on open source
well it sounds like a very complex topic, you've got your work cut out for you
